it.escape.core.client.connection.rmi

Class ProxyToServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.escape.core.client.connection.rmi.ProxyToServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindDisconnectCallbackInterface, ClientChannelInterface, ServerRemoteInterface, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ProxyToServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerRemoteInterface, ClientChannelInterface, BindDisconnectCallbackInterface
    Proxy to the server remote methods, this middle class is necessary, as it provides autenthication (needed by the server to know which client is talking) This class will also act as an interface for Relay to send strings to. This class will interpret any rmi errors as a server-side disconnetion, and will notify the subscriber
    Author:
    michele
